name: Who I am (pawloKoder)
description:
After waking up in a strange room with no memory of who they are, the player must discover the horrifying and intriguing secrets to their identity. A thought provoking experience which makes one question their own memories.

Created during Global Game Jam 2021.

Art: Joanna www.artstation.com/joannawawruch

Music and SFX: justdank

Writing & Scripting: Matteo

Game Design/Narrative Design: Braman

Programming: QUBIDREIN

Slacking around: pawlo

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com.

Additional font: https://www.1001fonts.com/digital-7-font.html
